title: [Bug]: Not having a browser opens the terminal when trying office files.
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

No.

### Describe the bug

When trying to open files in teams and not having a default browser installed it opens a random terminal, which is not wanted.

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

latest

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
Have files and links settings set to Browser. While not having a browser installed - opens a terminal instead of nothing.
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1. Default to "open in Teams"
...
```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```

### Additional context

_No response_
